Acquisition.description: A set of parameteres describing the data acquisition

beamshift.description: Movement of the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad.

beamtilt.description: Another way to move the beam above the sample for data collection purposes that does not require movement of the stage. Given in mrad.

beamtiltgroups.description: Number of Beamtilt groups present in this dataset - for optimized processing split dataset into groups of same tilt angle. Despite its name Beamshift is often used to achive this result.

binning_camera.description: Level of binning on the images applied during data collection

calibrated_defocus.description: Machine estimated defocus, min and max values in µm. Has a tendency to be off.

cryogen.description: Cryogen used in cooling the instrument and sample, usually nitrogen

date_time.description: Time and date of the data acquisition

dose_per_movie.description: Average dose per image/movie/tilt - given in electrons per square Angstrom

energy_filter.description: Whether an energy filter was used and its specifics.

exposure_time.description: Time of data acquisition per movie/tilt - in s

frames_per_movie.description: Number of frames that on average constitute a full movie, can be a bit hard to define for some detectors

gainref_flip_rotate.description: Whether and how you have to flip or rotate the gainref in order to align with your acquired images

grids_imaged.description: Number of grids imaged for this project - here with qualifier during this data acquisition

holder_cryogen.description: Type of cryogen used in the holder - if the holder is cooled seperately

image_size.description: The size of the image in pixels, height and width given.

images_generated.description: Number of images generated total for this data collection - might need a qualifier for tilt series to determine whether full series or individual tilts are counted

imageshift.description: Movement of the Beam below the image in order to shift the image on the detector. Given in µm.

nominal_defocus.description: Target defocus set, min and max values in nm.

nominal_magnification.description: Magnification level as indicated by the instrument, no unit

screen_current.description: The total electron beam current hitting the viewing screen, in nA.

specialist_optics.description: Any type of special optics, such as a phaseplate

temperature.description: Temperature during data collection, in K with min and max values.

Acquisition.title: Acquisition

Any.description: Any type, used as the base for type-narrowing.
Any.title: Any

AssemblyEnum.description: Allowed molecular assembly values - compatible with the EMDB.
AssemblyEnum.title: AssemblyEnum

astigmatism_histogram.description: Filename of the astigmatism values histogram

Author.description: Details on the person performing the experiment.

orcid.description: ORCID of the author, a type of unique identifier

role.description: Role of the author, for example principal investigator

type_org.description: Type of organization, academic, commercial, governmental, etc.

Author.title: Author

CTFs.description: Class representing Contrast Transfer Function (CTF) metadata

descriptors.description: List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how movies were obtained or any related information

CTFs.title: CTFs

ChromaticAberrationCorrector.description: Special device used to correct instrument inherent chromatic aberration.

instrument_type.description: Details of a given specialist instrument

used.description: whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition

ChromaticAberrationCorrector.title: ChromaticAberrationCorrector

descriptors.description: List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how movies were obtained or any related information

images_classes_2D.description: Filename of the image containing 2D class images

descriptors.description: List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how movies were obtained or any related information

images_classes_3D.description: Filename of the image containing 3D class images

descriptors.description: List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how movies were obtained or any related information

micrograph_examples.description: Filename of micrographs shown as examples in descending order based on the number of particles

num_source_micrographs.description: Total number of micrographs from which coordinates come from

particles_histogram.description: Filename of histogram for particle number per micrograph

particles_per_micrograph.description: Mean number of particles per micrograph

defocus_histogram.description: Filename of the defocus values histogram

defocus_micrograph_examples.description: Filename of micrographs shown as examples in ascending order of defocus value

collection_angle.description: Collection angle set, min and max values in mrad.

dispersion.description: Dispersion of an analytical detector, in eV

mode.description: Mode of the detector, e.g. "counting", "ScanningDetector", "ImagingDetector", etc.

EMDatasetSpa.description: Single particle cryo electron microscopy dataset

instrument.description: Describe the instrument used to acquire the data

EMDatasetSpa.title: EMDatasetSpa

EnergyFilter.description: A device used to filter for electrons with specific energy.

used.description: whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition

width_energy_filter.description: Width of the energy filter used.

EnergyFilter.title: EnergyFilter

type_org.description: Type of organization, academic, commercial, governmental, etc.

Grid.description: Details on the grid used in the experiment.

film_material.description: Type of material the support film is made of

film_support.description: Whether a support film was used

material.description: Material out of which the grid is made

mesh.description: Grid mesh in lines per inch

pretreatment_atmosphere.description: Atmospheric conditions in the chamber during pretreatment, i.e., addition of specific gases, etc.

pretreatment_pressure.description: Pressure of the chamber during pretreatment, in Pa

pretreatment_time.description: Length of time of the pretreatment in s

pretreatment_type.description: Type of pretreatment of the grid, i.e., glow discharge

Grid.title: Grid

ImageSize.description: size of a 2D image (in integer units)

height.description: The height of a given item - unit depends on item

width.description: The width of a given item - unit depends on item

ImageSize.title: ImageSize

Instrument.description: Instrument values, mostly constant across a data collection.

acceleration_voltage.description: Voltage used for the electron acceleration, in kV

beam_convergence.description: Refers to how tightly or widely the electron beam is focused onto the sample, in mrad. Typically low convergence for TEM and high for STEM.

c2_aperture.description: C2 aperture size used in data acquisition, in µm

cs.description: Spherical aberration of the instrument, in mm

electron_source.description: Type of electron source used in the microscope, such as FEG

illumination.description: Mode of illumination used during data collection

imaging.description: Mode of imaging used during data collection

operating_mode.description: Operating mode of the microscope, i.e. "TEM", "STEM"

Instrument.title: Instrument

front_view.description: Filename of the front view isosurface image

side_view.description: Filename of the side view isosurface image

top_view.description: Filename of the top view isosurface image

present.description: Whether the model contains any ligands

reference.description: Link to a reference of your ligand, i.e., CCD, PubChem, etc.

smiles.description: Provide a valid SMILES string of your ligand

descriptors.description: List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how movies were obtained or any related information

Molecule.description: More detailed information about individual molecules.

expression_system.description: Scientific name of the organism used to produce the molecule of interest

gene_name.description: Name of the gene of interest

molecular_type.description: Description of the overall molecular type, i.e., a complex

name_mol.description: Name of an individual molecule (often protein) in the sample

natural_source.description: Scientific name of the natural host organism

sequence.description: Full sequence of the sample as in the data, i.e., cleaved tags should also be removed from sequence here

taxonomy_id_expression.description: Taxonomy ID of the expression system organism

taxonomy_id_source.description: Taxonomy ID of the natural source organism

Molecule.title: Molecule

MoleculeClassEnum.description: Allowed molecule class values - compatible with the EMDB.
MoleculeClassEnum.title: MoleculeClassEnum

descriptors.description: List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how movies were obtained or any related information

Organizational.description: Overarching category for authors and grants

authors.description: List of authors associated with the project

grants.description: List of grants associated with the project

Organizational.title: Organizational

orthogonal_slices_X.description: Filename of orthogonal slices in X direction

orthogonal_slices_Y.description: Filename of orthogonal slices in Y direction

orthogonal_slices_Z.description: Filename of orthogonal slices in Z direction

assembly.description: What type of higher order structure your sample forms - if any.

molecular_overall_type.description: Description of the overall molecular type, i.e., a complex

source.description: Where the sample was taken from, i.e., natural host, recombinantly expressed, etc.

Phaseplate.description: Used to modulate the phase of the electron wave.

used.description: whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition

Phaseplate.title: Phaseplate

Processing.description: Set of parameters describing the data processing
Processing.title: Processing

QuantitySI.description: unit value extended to have two additional fields si_value and si_unit

unit.description: the unit of a given value

unitSI.description: the SI unit attached to a si value

value.description: the value of a field with a unit

valueSI.description: value of a given field in respect to its SI unit

QuantitySI.title: QuantitySI

QuantityValue.description: if a value has a unit, it should be given as a unit value pair.

unit.description: the unit of a given value

value.description: the value of a field with a unit

QuantityValue.title: QuantityValue

Range.description: A range constructed from min and max

maximal.description: Maximal value of a given dataset property

minimal.description: Minimal value of a given dataset property

Range.title: Range

resolution_histogram.description: Filename of the resolution values histogram

Sample.description: Unifying class to describe the full sample.

ligands.description: List of ligands associated with the sample

molecule.description: List of molecule associated with the sample

Sample.title: Sample

ligands.description: List of ligands associated with the sample

molecule.description: List of molecule associated with the sample

Series.description: A series of numbers constructed from min, max, and increment

increment.description: Increment between elements of a series

maximal.description: Maximal value of a given dataset property

minimal.description: Minimal value of a given dataset property

Series.title: Series

SpecialistOptics.description: Optional optics used to correct for instrument limitations.

chromatic_aberration_corrector.description: Specialist device to correct for chromatic aberration of the microscope lenses

phaseplate.description: Phaseplate is a special optics device that can be used to enhance contrast

spherical_aberration_corrector.description: Specialist device to correct for spherical aberration of the microscope lenses

SpecialistOptics.title: SpecialistOptics

buffer.description: Name/composition of the (chemical) sample buffer during grid preparation

concentration.description: Concentration of the (supra)molecule in the sample, in mg/ml

humidity.description: Environmental humidity just before vitrification, in %

temperature.description: Environmental temperature just before vitrification, in K

vitrification_cryogen.description: Which cryogen was used for vitrification

SphericalAberrationCorrector.description: Special device used to correct instrument inherent spherical aberration.

instrument_type.description: Details of a given specialist instrument

used.description: whether a specific instrument was used during data acquisition

SphericalAberrationCorrector.title: SphericalAberrationCorrector

descriptors.description: List of custom descriptors for user-defined key-value pairs describing how movies were obtained or any related information

vol_number_particles.description: Number of particles associated to volume

description: Single particle cryo electron microscopy dataset

instrument.description: Describe the instrument used to acquire the data

title: oscem-schemas-spa
